name: State of Anarchy: Master of Mayhem
name_original: State of Anarchy: Master of Mayhem
description:
You were an ordinary citizen in a small town… Now it’s on fire! Rioters are storming the houses, anarchy reigns the streets! The perfect time for an alien invasion! Somebody must stop this madness… It’s gonna be YOU!
Fight your way through the burning streets, chase the aliens and hit their homeworld. YOU GOTTA TEACH’EM A LESSON!!!

Features:
- Prepare for insane bullet hell action,
- Enjoy hilarious doodle graphics and mouth made sound effects,
- Play 4 mission types: storm a bank, chase a UFO, hit an alien homeworld and escape in a spaceship!
- Use 13 weapons,
- Shoot 60+ enemies and bosses,
- Drive 3 cars and 6 spaceships,
- Obtain new talents and weapon upgrades,
- Beat 48 stages,
- Enjoy awesome rock music!
